subject: Hockey, Ice
Draft and Recruitment (Sports)
lead_paragraph: The two most dynamic young prospects were taken first and second on Friday at the N.H.L. draft. McDavid was selected first by the Edmonton Oilers, and Eichel by the Buffalo Sabres.
snippet: The two most dynamic young prospects were taken first and second on Friday at the N.H.L. draft. McDavid was selected first by the Edmonton Oilers, and Eichel by the Buffalo Sabres.
